title: Mathematical Content Transformation Design for Large-Scale Virtual Classroom Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and professional work experience
context.additional_context: Designed for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to learn math content in virtual classrooms using smartphones. Applied a systematic learning design framework using the Fuzzy Delphi technique.

learning_goals: Learners can complete PBL projects in a virtual classroom environment with over 80% completion to solve mathematics problems linked to professional tasks.
Learners can convert existing content into educational materials for virtual classrooms by applying a fuzzy Delphi-based learning design framework.
Learners can use collaborative tools and digital resources for mathematics learning in smartphone-based constrained technical environments with 90% utilization efficiency.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
